name: Chuuni Tales
description:
Sypnosis: 

A group of 4 troubled individuals ended up getting caught in a massive earthquake that knocked them out. As they woke up, they discovered that they were summoned into another world in order to aid the Ethereal Overseers to help them maintain peace and order in their lands. Later on they discovered that the Ethereal Overseers aims to conquer lands and revive a certain God of Chaos that will wreak havoc all throughout the lands, and it is the 4 heroes' mission to save them.

Characters:

  • Dia - an ambitious quiet and snobbish loner with social anxieties and trust issues. 
  • Chris - a moody boy with anger management issues who pushes everyone away. 
  • Ron - an energetic boy who gets bullied in class because of his childishness and extreme enthusiasm.
  • Shan - a slow and shy artistic girl who gets taken advantage of because of her kind and patient nature. 

The Dev Team:

- Dianne Chrystalin Brandez: Programmer, Game Designer, Pixel Artist
- Christopher Joshua An: Scenario Writer, Lead Animator
- Ron Carl Joseph Marcos: Script Writer
- Shanelle Espiritu: Lead Graphic Artist

Creator's Note:

-This game is still really buggy but we will continue on working on its improvements.

-Story hasn't been added yet, currently testing out its game mechanics

-WARNING: REALLY BUGGY!!!
